1.text: You wake up in a misty forest. A chill runs down your spine.

2a.text: The howl grows louder. You spot a trail of paw prints.

2b.text: From the tree, you see a figure darting through the trees.

2c.text: You hear footsteps approaching from behind.

3a.text: The trail ends at a cave. You hear breathing inside.

3b.text: You return to where you started, but the trees have shifted.

3c.text: You chase the figure and discover a hidden village.

3d.text: The figure vanishes. You see smoke in the distance.

3e.text: A cloaked stranger responds to your call.

3f.text: The footsteps pass by. A map falls from a passing traveler.

a.text: Pick it up and follow it

endings.end_1: You survive the night, but the forest keeps its secrets. You are never the same again.
endings.end_2: You wander endlessly. Eventually, the forest swallows you whole.
endings.end_3: You escape the forest and find refuge. Your story becomes legend.
